intro: Pourthiaea zhejiangensis, commonly known as the Zhejiang pourthiaea, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered yellow flowers and hairy leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
